name: BuddhistMatrimony - Buddhist Wedding, Marriage App
description: BuddhistMatrimony App is an exclusive app developed for Buddhist brides and Buddhist grooms. Buddhist matrimony app is a part of the community matrimony apps from MATRIMONY.COM Ltd. Buddhist Matrimony app is designed keeping in mind various partner preferences that a bride or groom might choose to find their life partner. Our Buddhist Matrimony app is intelligently designed to give you the best results to match you with your life partner.  We are the largest matrimonial platform for Buddhist community. Our app and web Buddhist matrimonial services have enabled 1000s of Buddhist weddings.  Our database consists of brides and grooms from different Professions, Educational Backgrounds, Regions & Sub Castes, Our databases of Buddhists aims to provide you with the best possible match to find the love of your life.  Buddhist Matrimony App Features :  Free Registration Safe and Secure APP. 100% privacy guaranteed Find your life partner at your convenience User Friendly Interface and Features, for easy partner search  Get instant notifications when a partner communicates  Express your interest to shortlisted prospective matches Shortlist and save potential matches Know who viewed & shortlisted your profile  Search from 1000s of NRI profiles across the globe Indias most trusted matrimony services app from Matrimony.com Limited  Find your partner from our other Regional Apps from Matrimony.com, Tamil Matrimony, Kerala Matrimony, Urdu Matrimony, Punjabi Matrimony, Hindi Matrimony, Bengali Matrimony, Gujarati Matrimony, Kannada Matrimony, Marathi Matrimony, Marwadi Matrimony, Oriya Matrimony, Telugu Matrimony, Assamese Matrimony, Parsi Matrimony and Sindhi Matrimony.  We have members who register from branches such as Mahayana, Nichiren, Pure Land, Tantrayana, Theravada, Tendai & Zen.   We have members from India and other countries like USA, UAE, Sri Lanka, Malaysia & Canada.   Profiles are registered from cities across the country such as Mumbai, Pune, Nagpur, Thane & Aurangabad.  BuddhistMatrimony.com is a part of CommunityMatrimony.com from Matrimony.com - An Exclusive Community based Matrimony Service, we provide Exclusive Apps through our 40Plus Matrimony, Divorcee Matrimony, Manglik Matrimony, Any Caste Matrimony, Ability Matrimony and Defence Matrimony.  BuddhistMatrimony is a part of and is pioneered by CommunityMatrimony - an exclusive community oriented service for shaadi. Thousands of people from several Indian communities have found their perfect life partner here.  Your privacy is a top priority for us at all times, so feel safe. We are a 100% secure app for shaadi.  So, what are you waiting for? Download the BuddhistMatrimony app now and find your significant someone. Register FREE!
